author: Pebble Bike

changelog.release_notes:
WHAT'S NEW v2.9.1
 * [Pebble 2] Add support for Pebble 2 and built-in heart rate monitor
 * [Pebble classic] Add more functions thanks to advanced memory optimizations (Overlays, thanks gregoiresage)
 * [Firmware 4] Add App Glance : displays distance and ascent in the Pebble app menu

WHAT'S NEW v2.9.0
 * [Pebble 2] Add support for Pebble 2 and built-in heart rate monitor
 * [Pebble classic] Add more functions thanks to advanced memory optimizations (Overlays, thanks gregoiresage)
 * [Firmware 4] Add App Glance : displays distance and ascent in the Pebble app menu

WHAT'S NEW v2.8.0
 * Navigation: follow a route on your Pebble:
  - load a GPX containing a route to follow in the menu
  - get directions on your Pebble, using the compass or the map
  - customize your screens to display navigation data: distance to next point, distance to destination, time to destination and time of arrival
  - online planner to generate your own route from Google Directions
  - Note: avoid routes with return path on the same path (after a half turn)
 * [Pebble 4.0]: add App Glance with distance and ascent
 * Pebble: add Italian (thanks Riccardo Fantoni), Japanese (thanks Moyashi) and Dutch (thanks Erwin Dirkx - specific watchapp)

-> http://pebblebike.com/v2.8.0

WHAT'S NEW v2.8.0
 * Navigation: follow a route on your Pebble:
  - load a GPX containing a route to follow in the menu
  - get directions on your Pebble, using the compass or the map
  - customize your screens to display navigation data: distance to next point, distance to destination, time to destination and time of arrival
  - online planner to generate your own route from Google Directions
  - Note: avoid routes with return path on the same path (after a half turn)
 * [Pebble 4.0]: add App Glance with distance and ascent
 * Pebble: add Italian (thanks Riccardo Fantoni), Japanese (thanks Moyashi) and Dutch (thanks Erwin Dirkx - specific watchapp)

-> http://pebblebike.com/v2.8.0

WHAT'S NEW v2.7.0:
  * Runkeeper automatic upload
    - go in the settings to grant the access to Runkeeper
    - upload manually from the menu or automatically at the end of the track

WHAT'S NEW v2.6.0:
  * Strava automatic upload
    - go in the settings to grant the access to Strava
    - upload manually from the menu or automatically at the end of the track
  * [Time series] Rotation mode: long press middle button to automatically cycle every 5 seconds between your data screens

WHAT'S NEW v2.5.0:
  * Pebble: add graphs in top field (altitude, ascent, heart rate or speed)
  * Pebble: data screens share the same template
  * Add heart rate zones + alarms
    - 5 zones: Very Light, Light, Moderate, Hard, Maximum
    - configure max heart rate in the android settings
    - background color changes with HR zone (middle screen only)
    - cumulative time in each zone
  * Pebble: add german (thanks Hanspeter Jochmann), spanish (thanks ZoretMan) and french
  * Pebble topbar: now configurable + bigger font
  * [Pebble Time and Round only] add steps and steps cadence (data from Pebble Health)
  * Other bugfixes (max speed, reset data, initial values)

-> http://pebblebike.com/v2.5.0

WHAT'S NEW v2.5.0:
  * Pebble: add graphs in top field (altitude, ascent, heart rate or speed)
  * Pebble: data screens share the same template
  * Add heart rate zones + alarms
    - 5 zones: Very Light, Light, Moderate, Hard, Maximum
    - configure max heart rate in the android settings
  * Pebble: add german (thanks Hanspeter Jochmann), spanish (thanks ZoretMan) and french
  * Pebble topbar: now configurable + bigger font
  * Other bugfixes (max speed, reset data, initial values)

-> http://pebblebike.com/v2.5.0
Support for Pebble Classic 3.8 (Timeline on pebble)

WHAT'S NEW v2.3.0:

* New watchapp with more fields and colors
* Support for Pebble Time Round
* New GPS adaptative modes to reduce battery usage

WHAT'S NEW v2.2.0:

* BLE: support for multiple devices at the same time (HRM+CSC)
* GPX: use Garmin format for better compatibility with Strava and export hear rate and cadence by default
* BLE CSC: use instant speed from sensor if available - Configure your wheel size in the settings
* BLE: support for temperature (Wahoo Blue SC)
* BLE Running Speed and Cadence (RSC) - TickrX, experimental, Canvas only
* Pebble: display phone battery levels in menu

WHAT'S NEW v2.1.0:

* New name for the app. Pebble Bike is now Ventoo
* Configurable screens on the Pebble 
* BLE Cycling Speed and Cadence (CSC) 
* GPX: add heart rate and cadence 
* Improve accuracy for altitude from pressure sensor 
* Map My Tracks: send altitude and heart rate

* Android: New UI
* Save tracks and export them as GPX
* Customizable screens with Canvas plugin
* Pebble Time compatibility
* New version 2: complete rewrite of the app since 1.x
* New units: nautical and running
* Improve data transmission to Pebble

* Bigger topbar
* New app icon
* Bugfix on average speed

* prevent unwanted exits (double click to exit)
* bugfix: remove artefacts on map
* optimize memory usage

* Bluetooth Smart (BLE) Heart Rate Monitor
* If available, use pressure sensor to improve altitude accuracy
* Display altitude above sea level (instead of WGS84)
* OruxMaps: option to start it when Pebble Bike starts
* Pebble: Bluetooth state
* Pebble: display phone & watch battery levels in menu

description:
(formerly known as Pebble Bike)

Ventoo is a GPS sports tracker for your Pebble. It uses your phone's GPS to send speed, distance and altitude data to your Pebble.

You can automatically upload your track to Strava or Runkeeper at the end of the track.

If you got a Bluetooth LE Heart Rate Monitor (HRM) or Cycling Speed and Cadence (CSC), you can display heart rate (and zones with alarms) and cadence on your Pebble.

Ventoo also has an innovative auto start feature which will auto start the bike computer on your watch when it detects you are riding a bike (it uses low battery technology, you can leave this switched on all day).

Ventoo has a Live Tracking function that sends your position every 30 seconds to the internet. You can receive your friends'positions and display them with your own track, directly on your Pebble.

Features:
* GPS cycle computer (instant speed, average speed, distance, altitude, positive ascent, ascent rate, slope)
* If available, use pressure sensor to improve altitude accuracy (Galaxy S3+, Nexus 4+...)
* Tracks can be saved as GPX and exported to compatible services (Strava, Runkeeper...)
* Multiple units (metric, imperial, nautical, pace...)
* Bluetooth Smart (BLE) Heart Rate Monitor (classic bluetooth HRM are not supported) and Cycling Speed and Cadence (CSC)
* Watchapp in english, german, spanish and french
* Customizable screens with built-in configuration or with Canvas plugin
* OruxMaps integration

This app has no affiliation with the Swiss rights holder named Ventoo GmbH.
